description: This chapter describes Jonah's anger, the LORD's lesson to him through the gourd plant, and the LORD's compassion for Nineveh.

questions.question: How did it affect Jonah?
How was Jonah?
Who did Jonah pray unto?
Where was Jonah when he said this?
options: When I was yet in my country
When I was on the ship
When I was on the shore

questions.question: Where did Jonah flee before?
What did Jonah know about the LORD?
options: I knew that thou art a gracious God, and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repentest thee of the evil
I knew that thou art a harsh God
I knew that thou art a just God
I knew that thou art a holy God

questions.question: What did Jonah ask the LORD to do?
options: Take, I beseech thee, my life from me

questions.question: Why did Jonah say it is better for me to die than to live?
options: For it is better for me to die than to live
For it is better for me to be rich than to live
For it is better for me to be famous than to live
For it is better for me to be comfortable than to live

questions.question: What did the LORD ask Jonah?
options: Doest thou well to be angry?
Doest thou well to be happy?
Doest thou well to be afraid?
Doest thou well to be sad?

questions.question: Where did Jonah go?
options: Went out of the city, and sat on the east side of the city
Went to the west side of the city
Went to the north side of the city

questions.question: What did Jonah do there?
options: There made him a booth, and sat under it in the shadow, till he might see what would become of the city

questions.question: What did the LORD God prepare?
options: Prepared a gourd, and made it to come up over Jonah

questions.question: What was the purpose of the gourd?
options: That it might be a shadow over his head, to deliver him from his grief
That it might be food for him
That it might be medicine for him
That it might be decoration for him

questions.question: How did Jonah feel about the gourd?
options: So Jonah was exceeding glad of the gourd
So Jonah was exceeding sad about the gourd
So Jonah was exceeding afraid of the gourd
So Jonah was exceeding surprised by the gourd

questions.question: When did God prepare a worm the next day?
options: When the morning rose the next day

questions.question: What did the worm do to the gourd?
options: It smote the gourd that it withered

questions.question: When the sun did arise, what did God prepare?
What happened to Jonah when the sun beat upon his head?
options: That he fainted, and wished in himself to die

questions.question: What did God ask Jonah?
options: Doest thou well to be angry for the gourd?
Doest thou well to be happy for the gourd?
Doest thou well to be afraid for the gourd?
Doest thou well to be sad for the gourd?

questions.question: How many people did the LORD say are in Nineveh?
options: More than sixscore thousand persons that cannot discern between their right hand and their left hand
